(Before I reply with all my forces, this is kind of a note to Icedemon and 
everyone else.  Defenses are NOT up for the CF.  For two big reasons.  Number 
one, ALL the autoguns were blown apart.  Every last one of those pathetic 
autoguns.  Number two, there's a lockdown, and no way someone could just walk 
right into the CF, Maximal or not.  And Rhinox never went in before the 
lockdown or anything like that.  And if Angel Prime had a hologram, sensors 
would detect it didn't have an energy signature pretty easily unless you said 
it had false sensor readings, Icedemon.  Glad you stepped up hostilities 
though)


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
